name: Last Survivor
description:
Last Survivor

   Top-down shooter game made entirely in java using a self-made framework without any extra 3rd party libraries. The objective of the game is to kill alien invaders and survive as much time as you can. 

Game By: 

Ivan Mota

Controls: 

  • ASWD = move
  • Mouse = aim
  • Left click = fire weapond

Requirements:

  • Have Java SE Runtime Environment Installed

Feel free to send me any question, comment or suggestion  to my email:

  • Ivanmtta@gmail.com
